thread.title: Blast off into space for an unforgettable experience with Secret Cinema in LondonTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Blast off into space for an unforgettable experience with Secret Cinema in LondonTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Blast off into space for an unforgettable experience with Secret Cinema in LondonTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Blast off into space for an unforgettable experience with Secret Cinema in London Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Experience the sci-fi adventure of Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back first-hand, 35 years after it was first released. A secret location in London has been transformed into a huge art and performance centre.
Dressed for the occasion, meet at a secret cargo airport in London before you blast off into space for an unforgettable multi-layered theatrical experience, bringing together performance, music, theatre, art and the incredible worlds of Star Wars.
More than 500 DJs, bands and performers will perform on four stages during the show’s run. Artists include Goldie, Simian Mobile Disco, Jamie Jones, Posthuman and DJ Food.
Source: visitlondon.com
